item.description:
The Harvard Film Archive is screening 5 of Nicolas Philibert's documentaries over 3 nights. The director of these wonderful films will be present.

For what its worth, I've taken off from work to attend these.
Sunday's films are:"Louvre City" and "Animals and More Animals". Louvre City,which I've seen before, takes a look at France's most famous museum from the perspective of those who know it best: the people that work there. This night also will be the best opportunity for a group meetup for Philibert's films since this double feature conlcludes at 9:30

I'll be also attending the films on the 28th and 29th, so if people would like to "Meet-Up" after these -send me an email so that we can coordinate it.
Here is the HFA's description of Philibert's films:
http://hcl.harvard.ed...
item.name: The "All Too Human" documentaries of Nicolas Philibert
